name: Greymoor Hall
description:
A detective game where you are the killer. You've been invited to a dinner party at the opulent Greymoor Hall, but the other guests don't know that you're also planning to murder the host.

You'll need all your wits about you to gather information on the guests, murder the host unseen, and then frame someone else for the crime.

Made for the 40th GMC Jam, February 2020.
